results.name: The Kaiju is My Childhood Friend
Glitch - The Maze That Never Ends

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Graphics: Video card with at least 512MB Shared
  • Storage: 255 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04
  • Processor: 2GHz+
  • Graphics: Video card with at least 512MB Shared
  • Storage: 255 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
